steamWorkshop.title: Steam Workshop
steamWorkshop.description: Subscribe to our map on Steam Workshop. Your support drives our continuous updates.

membership.title: Membership Subscription
membership.note: ❗Remember to leave your Dota2 friend ID in the message to automatically activate your membership.
benefits: Receive 1000 membership points for each monthly subscription
Gain 100 membership points for playing every day
Get one extra reroll in Ability Draft
Respawn time reduced to 5 seconds, and buyback cooldown reduced to 2 minutes
Enjoy a special Membership BUFF in-game

github.title: GitHub
github.description: View project source code, changelog, and contribute to the project

about.title: About Project
about.description:
This is a DOTA2 custom map project that brings you a new 10v10 AI battle experience.
You can subscribe to membership to unlock more features and enjoy better gaming experience.
We will continue to optimize and update, your support is our motivation to keep improving.

disclosure.title: Business Disclosure
disclosure.description: According to the requirements of the Specified Commercial Transactions Act, we hereby disclose the following business information.

otherFees.title: Additional Fees
content: Payment processing fee: Fees will be charged according to the payment method

refundPolicy.title: Exchanges and returns policy
content: You can cancel your membership subscription at any time in your account settings
After cancellation, you can continue to use the service until the end of your current subscription period
We will handle special circumstances on a case-by-case basis

serviceTime.title: Delivery times
content: Membership service is available immediately after successful subscription payment

paymentCycle.title: Payment period
content: Alipay, WeChat Pay, and credit card payments are instant, membership service will be activated immediately after successful payment

manualActive.afdianDescription: For users who have purchased but failed to activate membership automatically, you can manually activate it by entering your Dota2 friend ID and Afdian Order No on this page.

steamId.title: Dota2 Friend ID
steamId.placeholder: Please enter your Dota2 friend ID
steamId.help: Please enter a valid Dota2 friend ID, format: numbers only, up to 10 digits
steamId.helpLink: How to find your Dota2 friend ID?

afdianOrderId.title: Afdian Order No
afdianOrderId.placeholder: Please enter your Afdian Order No
afdianOrderId.help: Please enter a valid Afdian Order No, format: numbers only, 24-30 digits
afdianOrderId.helpLink: How to find your Afdian Order No?

success.message: Your membership has been successfully activated. Thank you for your support! The membership will take effect in the next game.

error.afdianMessage: Please check if your Dota2 friend ID and Afdian Order No are correct. If the problem persists, please try again later.
